reddit.title: I built a platform that actually pays you for gaming
reddit.body:
Hey r/gaming,

Been working on this for 8 months. GG LOOP is live now.

**How it works:**
- Link your Riot account (League, Valorant, TFT)
- Play ranked games like you normally do
- Earn points automatically
- Redeem for real rewards (gift cards, gaming gear, even property investment)

**Premium subscription includes Options Hunter:**
- Track unusual options flow
- See what institutions are buying
- Real-time alerts for big money moves

Free tier available to test it out. Premium unlocks everything.

Check it out: https://ggloop.io/subscription

Happy to answer questions!

reddit.title: Options Hunter caught this $TSLA move 15 minutes early
reddit.body:
For anyone interested in options trading:

Our scanner detected unusual call activity on $TSLA yesterday at 2:47 PM.

Stock moved 8% today.

Options Hunter tracks institutional money flow in real-time. Pattern recognition + volume analysis + order flow data.

It's included with GG LOOP premium subscription (which also rewards you for gaming).

Interested traders: https://ggloop.io/subscription

Free demo available.

reddit.title: Theory: Gaming should be monetizable for everyone
reddit.body:
Streamers make money gaming. Esports pros make money gaming.

But the average ranked player? Nothing.

We built GG LOOP to change that.

**The vision:**
Every hour you invest in improving at League/Valorant/TFT should have real value. Your dedication should translate to real rewards.

**How we're doing it:**
- Automatic point tracking for ranked gameplay
- Reward redemption system (gift cards â†’ gaming gear â†’ property investment)
- Premium tier includes Options Hunter (options flow scanner)

**Long-term goal:**
Someone earns enough points to put a down payment on a house. Through gaming.

We're building toward that.

If this resonates, check out what we've built: https://ggloop.io/subscription

Feedback welcome.

reddit.title: For League players who also trade options
reddit.body:
Weird crossover, but hear me out.

GG LOOP subscription gives you:

1. **Gaming rewards** - earn points for ranked League games
2. **Options Hunter** - track institutional money flow in real-time

Both in one platform.

I'm a Diamond League player who also day-trades. This is exactly what I needed.

Options Hunter caught $SPY unusual flow yesterday. League games earned me $40 in rewards this week.

Check it out: https://ggloop.io/subscription

Free tier to test, premium unlocks everything.

reddit.title: Data-driven approach to options trading (Options Hunter)
reddit.body:
Built a scanner that tracks:

- Unusual options volume
- Large block trades
- Order flow imbalances
- Institutional positioning

Real-time alerts when patterns match historical profitable setups.

70% accuracy on signaled moves in backtesting.

It's part of GG LOOP premium (which also rewards gaming, but traders can subscribe for Options Hunter alone).

Demo: https://ggloop.io/subscription

Questions welcome.
